scripts.gen-verify-key: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey circuits/build/proving_key.zkey circuits/build/verification_key.json
scripts.create-proof: snarkjs plonk fullprove circuits/witness.json circuits/build/withdraw_multiplier_js/withdraw_multiplier.wasm circuits/build/proving_key.zkey circuits/build/proof.json circuits/build/public.json
scripts.verify-proof: snarkjs plonk verify circuits/build/verification_key.json circuits/build/public.json circuits/build/proof.json
scripts.export-verifier: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier circuits/build/proving_key.zkey circuits/build/WithdrawVerifier.sol
